actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of a national park, recreational area, or wilderness area in the Ridgelands East of the San Franciso Bay in the State of California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of a national park, recreation area, or wilderness area in the Ridgelands east of the San Francisco Bay in the State of California. Directs the Secretary to submit to the President and the Congress within one year a report of his findings and recommendations. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of a national park, recreational area, or wilderness area in the Ridgelands East of the San Franciso Bay in the State of California.
